trending.title: Sikandar
trending.description: When his foster father is murdered, a young man determined to protect his family finds himself entangled in a web of crime, deceit and political ambition.

trending.title: Primal Fear
trending.description: When a young altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, a hotshot Chicago lawyer takes on his case, believing the teen is innocent.

trending.title: Cold Case: The Tylenol Murders
trending.description: This docuseries revisits the 1982 Tylenol poisonings and the nationwide panic that ensued while investigators searched for the still-unknown culprit.

trending.title: Sirens
trending.description: Amidst the chaos of Beirut, the all-female ambulance squad of the Lebanese Red Cross races to save lives on the front lines of their fractured city.

trending.title: When Life Gives You Tangerines
trending.description: A rebellious teen finds new purpose in the literary arts after she's exiled to Jeju Island, where she forms a surprising bond with a steadfast poet.

trending.title: HIT: The Third Case
trending.description: A dutiful police officer’s relentless pursuit of a cold-blooded serial killer takes a toll on his personal life as he races to stop the next murder.

trending.title: The Truman Show
trending.description: When an insurance agent realizes his entire life is a reality show created for the entertainment of millions, the unwitting star must decide how to act.

trending.title: Fear Street: Prom Queen
trending.description: During prom season in 1988 Shadyside, a masked outsider with a vendetta suddenly appears to wreak bloody havoc on the town's popular clique.

popular.title: Collateral
popular.description: Cab driver Max picks up a man who offers him $600 to drive him around. But the promise of easy money sours when he realizes his fare is an assassin.

popular.title: Doubt
popular.description: Sister Aloysius begins to have doubts about doting Father Flynn, who seems to have become overly involved in the life of an African American pupil.

popular.title: The Theory of Everything
popular.description: Physicist Stephen Hawking and wife Jane Wilde struggle to balance his advancing illness and rising fame with her search for a purpose beyond marriage.

popular.title: Inglourious Basterds
popular.description: In Nazi-occupied France, American soldiers plan a fateful face-off to take out leaders of the Third Reich during a propaganda film premiere.

popular.title: Parasite
popular.description: One by one, the crafty members of a destitute family insinuate themselves into the household staff of a wealthy couple living in oblivious privilege.

popular.title: Arrival
popular.description: When alien ships land around the globe, a language expert tasked with deciphering their communications uncovers a life-altering message.

popular.title: Scent of a Woman
popular.description: Hoping to earn some cash over a holiday weekend, a prep-school student agrees to take care of a cantankerous retired Army colonel who's lost his sight.

popular.title: The Social Network
popular.description: Harvard sophomore Mark Zuckerberg pursues an idea that propels him to internet success, bringing in legal trouble and costing him friendships.

continueWatching.title: Little Things
continueWatching.description: A cohabiting couple in their 20s navigate the ups and downs of work, modern-day relationships and finding themselves in contemporary Mumbai.

continueWatching.title: The Office (U.S.)
continueWatching.description: This hit comedy chronicles the foibles of disgruntled office workers — led by deluded boss Michael Scott — at the Dunder Mifflin paper company.

continueWatching.title: Deva
continueWatching.description: Working on a complicated case, a fierce young police officer goes rogue to dismantle a lethal web of corruption and deceit — one epic battle at a time.

continueWatching.title: The Truman Show
continueWatching.description: When an insurance agent realizes his entire life is a reality show created for the entertainment of millions, the unwitting star must decide how to act.

continueWatching.title: Atonement
continueWatching.description: Troubled by her sister's romance with the housekeeper's son, a young girl makes a false accusation that will change the course of their lives forever.

continueWatching.title: Anweshippin Kandethum
continueWatching.description: Wrongfully suspended while pursuing the culprit in a missing persons case, a cop seeks redemption — and justice — when he gets a new assignment.

continueWatching.title: Scent of a Woman
continueWatching.description: Hoping to earn some cash over a holiday weekend, a prep-school student agrees to take care of a cantankerous retired Army colonel who's lost his sight.

continueWatching.title: Bheed
continueWatching.description: A border cop’s assignment to stop migrant workers from crossing during a lockdown erupts into a fight for humanity amid prejudice and suffering.

myList.title: The Queen's Gambit
myList.description: In a 1950s orphanage, a young girl reveals an astonishing talent for chess and begins an unlikely journey to stardom while grappling with addiction.
